newsArray.description: पाकिस्तान की टीम प्लेइंग इलेवन में बड़े बदलाव कर सकती है. अबरार अहमद और शाहीन अफरीदी को मौका मिलना मुश्किल लग रहा है. अफरीदी की जगह तेज गेंदबाज सलमान मिर्जा खेलते हुए नजर आ सकते हैं, जबकि फखर जमान टीम में वापसी कर सकते हैं. वहीं, इंग्लैंड ने श्रीलंका को अपने आखिरी मैच में 51 रन से हराया था. ऐसे में टीम अपने प्लेइंग इलेवन में कोई बड़ा बदलाव नहीं करना चाहेगी.

newsArray.title: Zimbabwe vs West Indies Live Score, T20 World Cup 2026: Unbeaten WI And ZIM Eye Winning Start In Super 8 in Mumbai; Check Toss Time
newsArray.description: Zimbabwe vs West Indies Live Cricket Score, T20 World Cup 2026 Super 8: The undefeated West Indies will take on a resolute Zimbabwe in a pivotal Super 8 Group 1 match of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026 at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai on Monday. Both teams are keen to maintain their winning streak and advance to the semi-finals. With explosive batting from Shai Hope, Shimron Hetmyer, and Sherfane Rutherford, as well as all-around depth from Jason Holder, Roston Chase, and Romario Shepherd, the Caribbean team has looked strong thus far. Meanwhile, Zimbabwe's stunning wins over Australia and Sri Lanka have made them one of the tournament's surprises. Their ascent has been largely attributed to Sikandar Raza's leadership and Brian Bennett's constancy at the top.Toss Time: The toss will take place at 6:30 PM IST and the match will start at 7:00 PM IST.Pitch Report: The Wankhede Stadium offers a flat, batter-friendly pitch with true bounce and short boundaries, though early swing may assist seamers before it eases out. With heavy dew expected later, chasing becomes advantageous, making bowling first the preferred choice after winning the toss.Where can we watch the ZIM vs WI match? The match can be watched live on Star Sports Network and JioHotstar.SquadsZimbabwe: Brian Bennett, Tadiwanashe Marumani(w), Ryan Burl, Sikandar Raza(c), Dion Myers, Tony Munyonga, Tashinga Musekiwa, Wellington Masakadza, Brad Evans, Graeme Cremer, Blessing Muzarabani, Richard Ngarava, Ben Curran, Clive Madande, Tinotenda MaposaWest Indies: Brandon King, Shai Hope(w/c), Shimron Hetmyer, Roston Chase, Sherfane Rutherford, Rovman Powell, Jason Holder, Matthew Forde, Akeal Hosein, Gudakesh Motie, Shamar Joseph, Romario Shepherd, Jayden Seales, Quentin Sampson, Johnson Charles
keywords: zim vs wi live cricket score
west indies vs zimbabwe live cricket
creator: times now digital

The match can be watched live on Star Sports Network and JioHotstar.SquadsZimbabwe: Brian Bennett, Tadiwanashe Marumani(w), Ryan Burl, Sikandar Raza(c), Dion Myers, Tony Munyonga, Tashinga Musekiwa, Wellington Masakadza, Brad Evans, Graeme Cremer, Blessing Muzarabani, Richard Ngarava, Ben Curran, Clive Madande, Tinotenda MaposaWest Indies: Brandon King, Shai Hope(w/c), Shimron Hetmyer, Roston Chase, Sherfane Rutherford, Rovman Powell, Jason Holder, Matthew Forde, Akeal Hosein, Gudakesh Motie, Shamar Joseph, Romario Shepherd, Jayden Seales, Quentin Sampson, Johnson Charles
